name: CavehillEnchiridion
0:
”Alexa open teacher facts”
”Alexa ask teacher facts for a fact”
”Alexa tell teacher facts to tell me trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: teacher facts
des:
Ask for Teacher Facts, and learn about Computer science teachers and what they teach.

Teacher Facts provides fun a new student can enjoy and is guaranteed to help you learn about your faculty.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Teacher Facts" or "Alexa, open Teacher Facts".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
